name: Quincy Sootbinder
description1: Charbroil: Deal 75 damage then heal for 50 HP if you have a HoT [0 pips]
description2: Douse The Flames: Pacify yourself for 2 turns [0 pips]
description3: Simmering Heat: Deal a 200, 4 turn DoT and clear enemy shield for a 75 trap [1 pip]
description4: Toasting Fire: Deal 125 damage and summon a minion if enemy has a DoT [1 pip]
description5: Refiner's Fire: Place a 300, 4 turn HoT and clear trap to activate it [2 pips]
description6: Boiling Heat: Deal a 300, 3 turn DoT to all enemies and clear enemy shield to place a 125 trap [4 pips]
description7: Boiling Point: Deal a 300, 3 turn DoT and add a 125 trap if enemy team has a minion [2 pips]
description8: S'more Power!: Deal a 75, 3 turn DoT or expel minion to summon your own minion [0 pips]
description9: Forge's Fire: Place a 400, 4 turn HoT and gain 1 pip if you have a HoT [3 pips]
description10: Cleansing Flame: Deal a 375, 3 turn DoT to all enemies and clear self of trap to deal 125 damage [5 pips]

name: Crackles Sparkwhisker
description1: Negative Charge: Place a -75 heal mantle on enemy [0 pips]
description2: Omnegation: Place a dispel on an enemy [1 pip]
description3: Decelerate: Stun enemy and place 50 weakness if they have a mantle [1 pip]
description4: Thunderbug: Deal 125 damage or 175 damage if enemy has a mantle [1 pip]
description5: Redirect Current: Place 125 blades on whole team and remove a DoT from each[3 pips]
description6: Vigilant Titan: Deal 250 damage to all enemies or 350 damage if enemy has a mantle [5 pips]
description8: Blitz Beast: Deal 200 damage and gain 1 pip if you have a HoT [2 pips]
description9: Cyclonic Swarm: Deal 250 damage and stun enemy [3 pips]
description10: Snap Kraken Pip: Deal 200 damage to all enemies and gain 2 pips if you have a HoT [4 pips]

name: Archibald Ratfink
description1: Pushback: Push trap then deal 75 damage [0 pips]
description2: Simple Minion: Summon a minion [0 pips]
description3: Rat Trap: Deal 125 damage or 175 if you have a trap on you [1 pip]
description5: Demoralize: Target minion and place 125 weaknesses on all enemies [3 pips]
description6: Charlatan's Deceit: Sacrifice minion and deal 325 damage to all enemies [5 pips]
description7: Disarming Spirit: Deal 125 damage and clear enemy blade for a 50 weakness [1 pip]
description8: Striking Ifrit: Deal 250 damage and stun enemy if they have a trap [4 pips]
description9: Blood-Thirsty Bat: Deal 125 damage or 200 damage if enemy has a DoT [1 pip]
description10: Share Power: Target minion to give whole team a double pip, 2 turn bubble [5 pips]

name: Robin Hoodwinker
description1: Invasive Species: Deal 50 damage and detonate a DoT [0 pips]
description2: Quick Recovery: Heal 75 HP or clear trap to heal 125 HP [0 pips]
description3: Strike And Retreat: Deal 100 damage and pacify self for 2 turns [1 pip]
description4: Secret Remedy: Place afterlife that heals team for 75 HP [1 pip]
description5: Stolen Strategy: Deal 200 damage and clear trap on self for a 200, 4 turn HoT [2 pips]
description6: Noble Rogue: Deal 300 damage to all enemies and clear traps of your team for a 225, 3 turn HoT [6 pips]
description7: Supportive: Heal 125 HP and gift 1 pip if target has a blade [1 pip]
description8: Raze The Roots: Deal 250 damage to all enemies and detonate a DoT [5 pips]
description9: Vandalize: Deal a 300, 4 turn DoT or a 400, 4 turn DoT if enemy team has a minion [2 pips]
description10: Preparation: Heal 375 HP or heal whole team for 250 if enemy team has a minion [3 pips]

name: Shadrach Shademonger
description1: Backstab: Steal a blade from enemy then deal 50 damage [0 pips]
description4: Cheapshot: Deal a 200, 4 turn DoT and place a 75 trap if enemy has a mantle [2 pips]
description5: Ambush: Place a 200 trap on all enemies and a 50 weakness if you have a shield [3 pips]
description6: Thousand Cuts: Deal a 300, 4 turn DoT on all enemies and a 125 trap if you have a blade [5 pips]
description7: Corruption: Place a 75 anti-heal shield on enemy [0 pips]
description8: Miasma: Place a 100 weakness on all enemies and steal a blade [4 pips]
description9: Contamination: Deal 100 damage and clear enemy HoT to deal a 75, 3 turn DoT [1 pip]
description10: Plunder: Steal all blades from enemy then deal 100 damage [3 pips]

name: Vernus Sandsifter
description1: Fair Trade: Deal 50 damage then swap blade / mantle (If you used a blade that wasn't protected it will swap after use)
description2: Sleight Of Hand: Swap blade / mantle then gift 1 pip [1 pip]
description3: Turn The Tables: Place a protected 100 weakness on enemy and a protected 50 blade [1 pip]
description4: Wounding Strike: Deal 150 damage and place a -50 heal blade on enemy [2 pip]
description5: Heist Prep: Gift 3 pips and clear blade / mantle for a bubble that gifts a pip for every spell cast on person that is ranked 2+. If bubble given, 2 more pips are given (costs 2 or more pips) [3 pips]
description6: Spider Sovereign: Deal 225 damage to all enemies
description7: Blind Strike: Place protected 100 blades on team and protected 100 weaknesses on enemy team [4 pips]
description8: Crippling Blow: Deal 150 damage and place a 100 weakness on enemy if there is a minion in play [2 pips]
description9: Scorpion Vecom: Deal 50 damage and stun enemy if they have a blade / mantle [0 pips]
description10: Lie In Wait: Place a 4 turn bubble that gifts a pip for every spell cast on person that is ranked 1+ (costs 1 or more pips) [3 pip]
